questions.question: What will be the flow of output of impulse response of 1st order system?

answers.b: System response will first increase exponentially and then decrease to its final value at t equal to infinity
answers.c: System response will exponentially decrease to its final value at t equal to infinity
answers.d: System response will exponentially increase to its final value at t equal to infinity

questions.question: What will be the flow of output of step response of 1st order system?

answers.b: System response will first increase exponentially and then decrease to its final value at t equal to infinity
answers.c: System response will exponentially decrease to its final value at t equal to infinity
answers.d: System response will exponentially increase to its final value at t equal to infinity

questions.question: What is the relationship between the coefficient of numerator and maximum amplitude of step response

answers.a: Increasing numerator coefficient value, maximum amplitude of step response decreases
answers.b: Increasing numerator coefficient value, maximum amplitude of step response increases
answers.c: Decreasing numerator coefficient value, maximum amplitude of step response increases
